document_data.caption: A map showing Crossbow Lane and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Crossbow Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Crossbow Lane''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Crossbow Lane was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road branched west off of [[Snail Street]], terminating on [[Watchmen's Way]] near the base of [[Castle Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable Locations: Several guard barracks sat on Crossbow Lane.
